heading: Vision & Mission of the Department
description: To develop data science professionals capable of creating intelligent solutions that transform industries through data-driven insights and innovation.

sections.title: Vision
sections.description: Our vision for the Data Science department.

items.description: To be a leading institution in Data Science education, producing graduates who drive innovation in data analytics and contribute to solving complex real-world problems through data-driven solutions.

sections.title: Mission of the Department
sections.description: Our mission to achieve excellence in Data Science education.

items.description: To provide comprehensive education in data science fundamentals and advanced analytics concepts.
To foster research and innovation in emerging data science technologies.
To develop industry-ready professionals with practical data analysis and implementation skills.
To promote ethical data science practices and responsible use of data.
To encourage entrepreneurship and innovation in data-driven solutions.
